title: vacchunu hari
sahitya:
vaccunu hari ninnujUDa vaccunu hari ninnu jUci meccunu hari ninnu jUci

anupallavi

 kuccita viSayAdula jUrcu rIti enci nIvu heccugAnu mA svAmini maccikatO nutiyimpu

caraNam 1

 dhIruni sItArAmavatAruni sakala lOkAdhAruni nija bhakta mandAruni nutiyimpavayya
   
caraNam 2

 dhanyuni vElpulalO mUrdhanyuni pratilEni lAvaNyuni parama kAruNyuni nutiyimpavayya
   
caraNam 3

 E japa tapamulaku rAdu AjanAdulaku rAdu rAjigA nutiyincu tyAgarAja nutuni nIvELa
